item.title: Getting Started with Hugo
item.description: Table of Contents What is Hugo ? Let’s Start ! Step 1. Install Hugo Step 2. Create New Site Step 3. Add A Theme Step 4. Start the Hugo Server Step 5. Push into your Github Pages Step 6. Have Fun ENV : OS : Ubuntu 18.04 Desktop Hugo : v0.93.0 What is Hugo ? Hugo is a fast and modern static site generator written in Go, and designed to make website creation fun again.
